sourcesContent:
var clone = require('clone')

module.exports = 
function fixRange(opts) {
  opts = clone(opts)

  var reverse = opts.reverse
  var end     = opts.max || opts.end
  var start   = opts.min || opts.start

  var range = [start, end]
  if(start != null && end != null)
    range.sort()
  if(reverse)
    range = range.reverse()

  opts.start   = range[0]
  opts.end     = range[1]

  delete opts.min
  delete opts.max

  return opts
}
